title: KKHH Completes 21 Years Of Release, Kangana To Launch Her Production House And More From Ent
text:
KKHH Completes 21 Years Of Release, Kangana To Launch Her Production House And More From Ent

KKHH Completes 21 Years Of Release, Kangana To Launch Her Production House And More From Ent

Kangana, who has always called out Bollywood's nepotistic nature is very sure that she wants to promote new talent without any biases.

"Rahul Aur Anjali ka jhagdaaa" Well, this line will never get old as 90's blockbuster 'Kuch Kuch Hota Hai' still remains a special film for most of us. While all the cult dialogues might be fresh in your memory, the super-hit has completed 21 years today! Director of the film, Karan Johar, took a stroll down the memory lane in an Instagram post and termed it a "timeless journey".

Also in attendance were director Zoya Akhtar and the film’s producer Ritesh Sidhwani. Priyanka also addressed the gathering. She co-hosted the evening with US-based Amazon Studios.

Don't Miss 101 SHARES 925 SHARES 25.6 K SHARES

Bollywood reunions are mostly special. Badhaai Ho cast members Ayushmann Khurrana, Gajraj Rao and Neena Gupta are reuniting for the upcoming sequel to the 2017 hit, Shubh Mangal Saavdhan. The sequel is titled Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan.

In her debut, Aniston shared a photo of hers with fellow Friends alums -- Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc, Matthew Perry and David Schwimmer.
description: Kangana, who has always called out Bollywood's nepotistic nature is very sure that she wants to promote new talent without any biases. Also in attendance were director Zoya Akhtar and the film’s producer Ritesh Sidhwani. Priyanka also addressed the gathering. She co-hosted the evening with US-based Amazon Studios.
